September 27, 1961
nr
Prof. H. Dennis Sherk x
Pennsylvania State University
College Park, Pennsylvania
Dear Dennis:
We would like to have an informal breakfast meeting of
the NAEB Research Committee on Tuesday, October 24, at 8:00
a.m. I do not know what the dining facilities will be at the
Marriott but assume that we will be able to find some sort of
place in the hotel. There is something called the Fairfield
Inn there, which I assume is in the hotel. We will meet there
unless I leave a note in your box at the hotel on Monday night
indicating otherwise.
If you have a moment, I would appreciate a card or note
indicating whether you will be able to make it. I am sorry
that there isn't time to take a poll to discover the best meetÂ¬
ing time for the entire committee. However, since this is the
first full day of the convention, I assume that most of you who
are coming at all will be there on that day. (As a matter of
fact, this will be the only day which I will be able to be at
the convention.)
Hope to see you in Washington.
Best
Samuel L. Becker, Chairman
NAEB Research Committee
